commitResults.messageTitle: Strengthen the file input validation for credit score of returned loans
commitResults.messageBody:
1) Adds a check to ensure that the credit score read from the file is
    within the acceptable credit score range
2) Shift all codes related to credit score file input validation to
    Storage::loadBorrowerCreditScoreForReturnedLoans()

commitResults.messageTitle: Adds an additional file validation check for borrower names

commitResults.messageBody:
1) Original logger in CommandHandler class is replaced with an
    instance of FinuxLogger class
2) FinuxLogger will not print logs to the console, but instead
    print logs to a logfile in append mode

commitResults.messageTitle: Shift FinuxLogger class to common package
commitResults.messageBody:
1) Set logger to null in the catch block of FinuxLogger constructor,
    in the event when either an IOException or a SecurityException is
    thrown
2) Declared a global static FINUX_LOGGER constant in Constant class
3) Modified the way FINUX_LOGGER is being used in the CommandHandler
    class
